InvitationInteractionDurationSlasher.Description: Duration of the Killer's Invitation interaction, in seconds

InvitationInteractionDurationCamper.Description: Duration of the Survivor's Invitation interaction, in seconds

InvitationChargeGainSlasher.Description: Number of charge(s) gained by Killers after collecting an Invitation

InvitationChargeGainCamper.Description: Number of charge(s) gained by Survivors after collecting an Invitation

MaxNumberOfChargesSlasher.Description: Total number of charges that can be held by Killers

MaxNumberOfChargesCamper.Description: Total number of charges that can be held by Survivors

ChargeRechargeRateSlasher.Description: Number of charges regained over time while in chase for Killers

ChargeRechargeRateCamper.Description: Number of charges regained over time while in chase for Survivors

AbilityCooldown.Description: Cooldown timer between usage of abilities, in seconds

FragilePalletDistance.Description: Maximum distance for the Fragile Pallet interaction, in centimetres

FragilePalletSpawnTime.Description: Amount of time for the pallet to spawn and become available for us, in seconds

VaultBlockerDistance.Description: Maximum distance for the Window Vault Blocker interaction, in centimetres

VaultBlockerDuration.Description: Amount of time the window vault is blocked to Killer, in seconds

BloodlustExposeDistance.Description: Maximum distance for the Bloodlust Down interaction, in centimetres

BloodlustExposeDuration.Description: Amount of time the Survivor holds the Exposed status effect, in seconds

RemoteDestroyDistance.Description: Maximum distance for the Remote Destroy interaction, in centimetres

RemoteDestroyDuration.Description: Amount of time for the pallet to break, in seconds

NegateStunDistance.Description: Maximum distance for the Negate Stun interaction, in centimetres

NegateStunPower.Description: Shorten the duration of the stun by a percentage value, 0.0 to 1.0

NegateStunDuration.Description: Duration of how long the Killer has the Endurance status effect, in seconds

ChargesForReward.Description: Required number of charges to be held at match end, escape, or death
